title: Shocking moment man randomly punches woman jogging in the street
text:
Horrifying video shows the moment when a homeless man brutally attacked a woman who was jogging in a Philadelphia neighborhood.

Surveillance footage shows the man - identified as 43-year-old Prevarious Fowler - standing outside of the Liberti Fairmount Church in the city's Spring Garden neighborhood on Tuesday.

In the brief clip, Fowler can be seen rummaging through trash as he stands outside the church.

Surveillance footage shows the man - identified as 43-year-old Prevarious Fowler - standing outside of the Liberti Fairmount Church before punching the woman

The woman slams into a rail leading up into the church as the man then kicks her in the face and sends her falling again

The woman jogging - clad in all black - can be seen making her way down the street.

All of a sudden, Fowler punches the woman and sends her flying backwards.

Fowler was arrested on Wednesday and charged with simple assault and recklessly endangering another person

The woman slams into a rail leading up into the church as the man then kicks her in the face and sends her falling again.

She scrambles to get back onto her feet before fleeing in the opposite direction.

Fowler can be seen walking back towards the trash as the clip comes to an end.

The incident is said to have occurred at around 6pm and the victim is said to be a 30-year-old woman, NBC Philadelphia reports.

Getting help from nearby residents, the woman was eventually taken to the Thomas Jefferson Hospital and treated for injuries to her face and left shoulder.

Fowler was arrested on Wednesday and charged with simple assault and recklessly endangering another person.

He was booked at the Curran-Fromhold Correctional Facility.
description: Surveillance footage shows the man - identified as 43-year-old Prevarious Fowler - standing outside of the Liberti Fairmount Church in the city's Spring Garden neighborhood. He then punches the woman.
